name: Venusaur

abilities.name: Energy Trans
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pok√©mon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

flavorText: This plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

strengths: Energy Trans moves Grass Energy freely between Pokemon
Can redirect energy to whoever needs it
weaknesses: Energy Trans only works with Grass Energy
synergies: Pokemon Center - Heal damage, redistribute energy after

competitiveHistory: Venusaur was sometimes paired with Pokemon Center in control strategies. Energy Trans allowed you to move all Grass Energy off a damaged Pokemon, use Pokemon Center to heal it for free, then redistribute the energy. This combo saw some tournament play.

rulings.ruling: Energy Trans can only move Grass Energy cards, not Special Energy.
You can use Energy Trans as many times as you like during your turn, moving one Grass Energy at a time.
Energy Trans can move Grass Energy to and from Benched Pokemon.
If Venusaur becomes Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed, Energy Trans cannot be used until those conditions are removed.
